articles.author: Jamie Carter
articles.title: It’s Six Years Since The ‘Great American Eclipse’ (And 231 Days Until The Next One) - Forbes
articles.description: Where were you on Aug. 21, 2017? Six years after the "Great American Eclipse" the U.S. along with Mexico and Canada are preparing for another total solar eclipse.
articles.content:
2017 Total Solar Eclipse in the United States of America
getty
We were somewhere around Moneta, Wyoming when the light began to fade. Its time to stop driving, I said. This is about to happen! With… [+3407 chars]
